long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing XDCPay Browser Extension!

XDCPay is your gateway to accessing decentralized applications (Dapps) built on the XDC blockchain, directly from your web browser.

With the XDCPay extension, seamlessly integrate XDC's XDPoS web3 API into any website's JavaScript context. This allows Dapps to interact effortlessly with the blockchain, enabling you to engage with a wide range of decentralized services and applications.

Additionally, XDCPay empowers you to create and manage your own identities through private keys, providing a secure and convenient way to access decentralized services. Your local client wallet ensures that you have full control over your digital assets and transactions.

What can you do with XDCPay?

Access XDC Dapps: Explore decentralized applications built on the XDC blockchain, ranging from financial services to gaming and beyond.
Manage XRC20 Tokens: Easily interact with XRC20 tokens, the standard for fungible tokens on the XDC network, enabling seamless token transfers and management.
Handle XDC223 Tokens: Take advantage of XDC223 tokens, designed for non-fungible tokens (NFTs), allowing for unique digital asset ownership and trading.
XDCPay is your all-in-one solution for accessing and managing decentralized services on the XDC blockchain. Experience the future of decentralized finance and applications with XDCPay Browser Extension!
